author: Danilo Toro -
description: Module to connect with Microsoft Active Directory | Módulo para conectarse a Microsoft Active Directory

description_lang.en: Connect with Microsoft Active Directory, manage every user account within the domain, make queries and more.
description_lang.es: Conéctese con Microsoft Active Directory, administre todas los usuarios dentro del dominio, realice consultas y más.
